text: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Sesungguhnya Kami merasakan kepada mereka sebahagian azab yang dekat (di dunia) sebelum azab yang lebih besar (di akhirat), mudah-mudahan mereka kembali (ke jalan yang benar).
